entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
